name: src/index.js
statSyncNoException
description: stat a file but don't throw if it doesn't exist

name: runDownPath
description: Search PATH to see if a file exists in any of the path folders.

return.description:
A fully qualified path, or the original path if nothing
                     is found

name: findActualExecutable
description:
Finds the actual executable and parameters to run on Windows. This method 
mimics the POSIX behavior of being able to run scripts as executables by 
replacing the passed-in executable with the script runner, for PowerShell, 
CMD, and node scripts.

This method also does the work of running down PATH, which spawn on Windows
also doesn't do, unlike on POSIX.

properties.name: cmd
properties.description: The command to pass to spawn

properties.name: args
properties.description: The arguments to pass to spawn

return.description: The cmd and args to run

name: spawnDetached
description:
Spawns a process but detached from the current process. The process is put 
into its own Process Group that can be killed by unsubscribing from the 
return Observable.

params.name: params
params.description: The parameters to pass to the child

return.description:
Returns an Observable that when subscribed
                                   to, will create a detached process. The
                                   process output will be streamed to this
                                   Observable, and if unsubscribed from, the
                                   process will be terminated early. If the
                                   process terminates with a non-zero value,
                                   the Observable will terminate with onError.

name: spawn
description: Spawns a process attached as a child of the current process.

params.name: params
params.description: The parameters to pass to the child

return.description:
Returns an Observable that when subscribed
                                   to, will create a child process. The
                                   process output will be streamed to this
                                   Observable, and if unsubscribed from, the
                                   process will be terminated early. If the
                                   process terminates with a non-zero value,
                                   the Observable will terminate with onError.

name: spawnDetachedPromise
description:
Spawns a process but detached from the current process. The process is put 
into its own Process Group.

params.name: params
params.description: The parameters to pass to the child

return.description:
Returns an Promise that represents a detached 
                                process. The value returned is the process 
                                output. If the process terminates with a 
                                non-zero value, the Promise will resolve with 
                                an Error.

name: spawnPromise
description: Spawns a process as a child process.

params.name: params
params.description: The parameters to pass to the child

return.description:
Returns an Promise that represents a child
                                process. The value returned is the process 
                                output. If the process terminates with a 
                                non-zero value, the Promise will resolve with 
                                an Error.
